data: CARD SURG MIS Mitral Valve Repair or Replacement (ERAS) - Pre Operative (Pre Anesthesia Clinic)
Notify Anaesthesiologists if patients receiving anticoagulation/antiplatelet agents for discontinuation and/or heparin bridging orders
Instruct patient to shower evening prior to surgery
Instruct patient to cleanse skin with chlorhexidine gluconate 2% wipes as per instructions following shower
Instruct patient to do oral rinse with chlorhexidine 0.12% swish x 30 seconds and spit QID x 48 hours pre-op
Carbohydrate Loading is not applicable for diabetic patients on insulin
Instruct patient to take last dose of clopidogrel or ticagrelor 6 days before surgery date unless drug eluting stent present
Instruct patient to take last dose of prasugrel 8 days before surgery date unless drug eluting stent present
Instruct patient to take last dose of dabigatran 4 days before surgery date for eGFR greater than 50 mL/min
Instruct patient to take last dose of dabigatran 6 days before surgery date for eGFR 30 to 50 mL/min
Instruct patient to take last dose of rivaroxaban 4 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of apixaban 4 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of warfarin 6 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to stop low molecular weight heparin 1 day pre-op
Instruct patient to take last dose of ACE Inhibitors (e.g. ramipril) or ARB (e.g. candesartan) 3 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of SGLT2 inhibitors (e.g. dapagliflozin, empagliflozin, canagliflozin) 4 days before surgery date
Confirm with Thrombosis Clinic if patient is on LMWH pre-op if further orders are required
